== Clone / Checkout ==

Dev branch:
{{{
git clone https://github.com/textpattern/textpattern.git dev
}}}

Latest stable release:
{{{
svn checkout http://textpattern.googlecode.com/svn/releases/4.5.7/source stable
}}}
